body.p: "Examination held in the Case of J. J. McAfee for shooting:

"John Cobb was in town on Monday sitting at Mrs Brown's, saw W. McDowell, Dr Mat Young gave him a pistol, the Crowd opened and McDowell fire a little first, Daniel fired immediately afterward, Came near the pump, they had by this time fired out all their shots; Mr McDowell changed his pistol & walked up towards Mr. Daniel, Mr. Daniel presented his pistol & Snapped. They Came together and clinched & Mr. McAfee came up as if to give a pistol, Then Mr. Daniel seemed to shrink which turned Mr. McDowell's side toward Mr. McAfee who then presented his pistol & fired -- Mr. McAfee then threw up his pistol and walked away. --

McDowell has two wounds -- one in his back, the other in the right leg, he is improveing though still dangerous, looks as if he might get well -- the paralysis might Kill him -- wound is in the back, Ball entered the skin an inch or so from back bone, could'nt trace the ball, near the spine in the small of the back -- Thinks may be the ball is in the spine --. Wound looks well so far as inflamation is Concerned -- If he Continues to improve the Chances are in his favor -- "
Endorsed -- "Substance of evidence for Comlth: -- Commonwealth -- John J. McAfee"

The foregoing is a true Copy of all the written evidence of Witnesses returned & filed in my office with ^the^ papers under the prosecution in the name of the Commonwealth of Ky -- against John J. McAfee for shooting &c this 21st Sept 1861. --
attest M. T. Lowry c. J. c. c.
